original_text:
“This is what the Lord says:
“‘I will restore the fortunes of Jacob’s tents
    and have compassion on his dwellings;
the city will be rebuilt on her ruins,
    and the palace will stand in its proper place.
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시니라 보라 내가 야곱 장막의 포로들을 돌아오게 할 것이고 그 거처들에 사랑을 베풀 것이라 성읍은 그 폐허가 된 언덕 위에 건축될 것이요 그 보루는 규정에 따라 사람이 살게 되리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says
I will restore the fortunes of Jacob's tents
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 야곱의 장막들의 형통을 회복할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and have compassion on his dwellings
the city will be rebuilt on her ruins
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성읍은 그 폐허 위에 재건될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the palace will stand in its proper place
